subject: Task Completion Report
content:
Task crit-1-dm-components completed successfully.

All acceptance criteria met:
✅ DMList shows real DM conversations with Matrix SDK integration
✅ Click to open DM chat functionality implemented
✅ DMChatHeader shows user info with online status
✅ Online status visible in both components
✅ Build passes: npm run build succeeded

- /home/ubuntu/repos/melo-v2/components/chat/dm-chat-header.tsx
